entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
